emailfields0.subject: New Enrollment for your course '{{subject.title}}'
emailfields0.body:
Hello {{course_author.name}},
{{student.name}} has enrolled to your course '{{course.title}}'.

This is a system generated email from {{global.sitename}}

smsfields0.body: Hi {{course_author.name}}, {{student.name}} has enrolled to your course '{{course.title}}'.

template2.title: Enrollment Approval notification for course creator.

emailfields0.subject: A new enrollment for your course {{subject.title}} needs approval
emailfields0.body:
Hello {{course_author.name}},

{{student.name}} has applied to enroll for your course {{course.title}}. You can process this request from the 'Manage Enrollments' menu..

This is a system generated email from {{global.sitename}}

smsfields0.body:
Hi {{course_author.name}},
{{student.name}} has applied to enroll for your course {{course.title}}. You can approve the same from 'Manage Enrollments' menu.

emailfields0.subject: You have enrolled for ‘{{subject.title}}’!
emailfields0.body:
Hello {{student.name}},

You have enrolled for the course {{course.course_link}} on {{global.sitename}}.

Best wishes for your learning journey!

This is a system generated email from {{global.sitename}}

smsfields0.body:
Hi {{student.name}},
You have enrolled for the course {{course.course_plain_link}} on {{global.sitename}}.
Best wishes for your learning journey!

emailfields0.subject: Congratulations! your enrollment for '{{subject.title}}' course is approved.
emailfields0.body:
Hello {{student.name}},

Your enrollment for the course {{course.course_link}} is now approved and you can access the same.

Best wishes for your learning journey!

This is a system generated email from {{global.sitename}}

smsfields0.body:
Hi {{student.name}},
Your enrollment for the course {{course.course_plain_link}} is approved and you can access the same.
Best wishes for your learning journey!

emailfields0.subject: Congratulations! You have completed {{subject.title}}
emailfields0.body:
Hello {{student.name}},

Congratulations.

You have just completed {{course.course_link}}!

Best wishes for your learning journey!

This is a system generated email from {{global.sitename}}

smsfields0.body:
Hi {{student.name}},
Congratulations!
You have just completed {{course.course_plain_link}}!

emailfields0.subject: {{subject.assigner}} has assigned {{subject.title}} to you!
emailfields0.body:
Hello {{student.name}}.

{{assigner.name}} has assigned the course “{{course.course_link}}” to you.

You need to complete it by {{assignment.end_date}}

Best wishes for your learning journey!

This is a system generated email from {{global.sitename}}

smsfields0.body:
Hi {{student.name}}.
{{assigner.name}} has assigned the course “{{course.course_plain_link}}” to you.
You need to complete it by {{assignment.end_date}}
Best wishes!

emailfields0.subject: {{subject.recommedBy}} has recommended {{subject.title}} to you!
emailfields0.body:
Hello {{recommendedTo.name}},

{{recommendedBy.name}} has recommended that you enroll for the course {{course.course_link}}.

We hope you enjoy the course!

This is a system generated email from {{global.sitename}}

smsfields0.body:
Hi {{recommendedTo.name}},
{{recommendedBy.name}} has recommended that you enroll for the course {{course.course_plain_link}}.
We hope you enjoy the course!

emailfields0.subject: Your subscription for the course ‘{{subject.title}}’ has expired
emailfields0.body:
Hello {{student.name}},

Your subscription for the course {{course.course_link}} has been expired.

In order to retain access, you need to buy a subscription once again.

Best wishes for your learning journey!

This is a system generated email from {{global.sitename}}

smsfields0.body:
Hi {{student.name}},
Your subscription for the course {{course.course_plain_link}} has been expired.
In order to retain access, you need to buy a subscription once again.

emailfields0.subject: Your course subscription is about to expire
emailfields0.body:
Hello {{student.name}},

Your subscription for the course {{course.title}} is expiring very soon. You will have to access and complete the course before the expiry.

Best wishes for your learning journey!

This is a system generated email from {{global.sitename}}

smsfields0.body:
Hi {{student.name}},
Your subscription for the course {{course.title}} is expiring very soon. Please complete it before expiry

emailfields0.subject: Thank you for submitting the exercise {{subject.title}} at “{{subject.sitename}}”
emailfields0.body:
Hello {{student.name}},

Thank you for submitting an exercise at {{global.sitename}}. Here are the details of the exercise you submitted:

Exercise name - {{exercise.title}}

Marks Scored - {{student.score}} / {{exercise.total_marks}}

Passing marks -{{exercise.passing_marks}} / {{exercise.total_marks}}

Time taken - {{student.time_taken}}

Exercise result - {{exercise.result}}

Click here ( {{exercise.assessmentUrl}}) to view the assessment

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

This is a system generated email from {{global.sitename}}

emailfields0.body:

Course
{{course.title}}, {{subscription.name}}
Bought by {{buyer.firstname}} {{buyer.lastname}}
Purchased On {{order.created_date}}
Expires {{subscription.name}}

Payment
Net Amount Paid {{subscription.final_amt}} (includes tax if any)

Order ID {{order.orderSuffix}}


You are receiving this email since you are the course creator

Hi,
There is a new purchase for your {{course.title}} at {{global.sitename}}.
